title: First debate Session
description: All the informations for the debate, knowing the subject, the country choice and the study guide, are available here.

title: Kick off meeting
description: Are you interested in MUN debates? Whether you want to participate or just watch, you can come and attend exciting debates. The debate is open to everyone, whether you are a novice or an expert. And it will be followed by a friendly aperitif!

title: Trip to Kamun
description: If you participated in the first debate sessions, you have the possibility to register to go on a trip with the MUN delegation. This trip is partly reimbursed by the Association (the precise reimbursement conditions will be indicated during registration).
